document.full_text: for the first time in germany, people as young as 16 years old will be able to vote in a state election sunday when citizens of the northern city-state of bremen head to the polls.
document.title: germany's bremen lets 16-year-olds vote to boost turnout
lines_and_colors: for the first time in germany, people as young as 16 years old will be able to vote in a state election sunday when citizens of the northern city-state of bremen head to the polls.
